UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CATH-2-derived antimicrobial peptide inhibits multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli infection in chickens
Literature.Author: Hao S, Shi W, Chen L, Kong T, Wang B, Chen S, Guo X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Chicken erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml,Chicken kidney cells:15% Cytotoxicity=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MBC=16-128µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MBC=32-128µg/ml)
